title: Ticket #1058: Scheduler::publish() is inconsistent with published schedd ad
description: START_SCHEDULER_UNIVERSE and START_LOCAL_UNIVERSE are evaluated in the context of an add created by Scheduler::publish(). This function is not used to produce the published schedd ad. There are differences in what is published in this ad and what is published in the visible schedd ad. Users have no way to know what is in the internal ad produced by Scheduler::publish(). The condor manual sort of hints that these expressions are evaluated in the context of the schedd ad, which is not true.
remarks:
